title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta. Cook pancetta until crisp. Whisk eggs with cheese. Drain pasta, toss with pancetta and egg-cheese mixture, season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked. Simmer tomato puree and cream, then add chicken. Serve hot.
